official_title: A bill to protect the integrity of the Nation's coinage through domestic control of the coinage process by requiring that the United States Mint use only gold refined in the United States for United States gold coins.

summary.text: Domestic Gold Coinage Control Act - Requires that gold acquired by the Secretary of the Treasury for minting of U.S. coins be refined in the United States. (Present law requires only that such gold be mined in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to protect the integrity of the Nation's coinage through domestic control of the coinage process by requiring that the United States Mint use only gold refined in the United States for United States gold coins.
